section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on August 3, 2023.*
section.heading: Rulemaking.
section.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (225 days) creation of § 4-773.06, see § 106 of Migrant Services and Supports Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-234, Dec. 21, 2022, 69 DCR 13991).
For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 106 of Migrant Services and Supports Temporary Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24-234, Dec. 21, 2022, 69 DCR 13991).
